flawed_nl_solution:
James is 37-15=<<37-15=22>>22 years old
So 8 years ago he was 22-8=<<22-8=14>>14 years old
That means Janet was 14/2=<<14/2=7>>7 years old 8 years ago
So Janet is now 7+8=<<7+8=11>>11 years old
That means Susan is 11-3=<<11-3=8>>8 years old
So in 5 years she will be 8+5=<<8+5=13>>13 years old
